comment: This class provides JNI-related methods to the native library.

methods.name: private static ClassLoader getSplitClassLoader(String splitName)
methods.comment:
* Returns a ClassLoader which can load Java classes from the specified split.
     *
     * @param splitName Name of the split, or empty string for the base split.

methods.name: public static void setClassLoader(ClassLoader classLoader)
methods.comment:
* Sets the ClassLoader to be used for loading Java classes from native.
     *
     * @param classLoader the ClassLoader to use.

methods.name: public static void splitMap(Map<K, V> map, K[] outKeys, V[] outValues)
methods.comment: Helper to convert from java maps to two arrays for JNI.

methodNames: public static void splitMap(Map<K, V> map, K[] outKeys, V[] outValues)
